issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Responses from the elb service omit trailing zeros in timestamps:

{code}
# eulb-describe-lbs
LOAD_BALANCER	balancer-4	balancer-4-000918558003.lb.e-39.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	2016-12-03T07:27:01.573Z	internet-facing
LOAD_BALANCER	balancer-3	balancer-3-000918558003.lb.e-39.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	2016-12-03T07:26:57.191Z	internet-facing
LOAD_BALANCER	balancer-5	balancer-5-000918558003.lb.e-39.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	2016-12-06T02:16:18.341Z	internet-facing
LOAD_BALANCER	balancer-0	balancer-0-000918558003.lb.e-39.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	2016-12-03T07:26:26.756Z	internet-facing
LOAD_BALANCER	balancer-6	balancer-6-000918558003.lb.e-39.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	2016-12-06T02:16:24.756Z	internet-facing
LOAD_BALANCER	balancer-8	balancer-8-000918558003.lb.e-39.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	2016-12-06T02:16:34.247Z	internet-facing
LOAD_BALANCER	balancer-2	balancer-2-000918558003.lb.e-39.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	2016-12-03T07:26:52.802Z	internet-facing
LOAD_BALANCER	balancer-9	balancer-9-000918558003.lb.e-39.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	2016-12-06T02:16:39.219Z	internet-facing
LOAD_BALANCER	balancer-7	balancer-7-000918558003.lb.e-39.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	2016-12-06T02:16:29.27Z	internet-facing
LOAD_BALANCER	balancer-1	balancer-1-000918558003.lb.e-39.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	2016-12-03T07:26:48.477Z	internet-facing
{code}

we should use the same binding date format configuration as we do with other services that preserves the trailing zeros:

{code}
  <format
          type="java.util.Date"
          deserializer="org.jibx.runtime.Utility.deserializeDateTime"
          serializer="com.eucalyptus.ws.util.SerializationUtils.serializeDateTime"/>
{code}
fields.summary: ELB responses omit trailing zeros in timestamps

comments.body:
Timestamps in responses can now have trailing zeros:

{code}
#
# eulb-describe-lbs
LOAD_BALANCER	balancer-2	balancer-2-000580826076.lb.c-09.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	2016-12-09T06:16:08.890Z	internet-facing
LOAD_BALANCER	balancer-3	balancer-3-000580826076.lb.c-09.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	2016-12-09T06:16:13.501Z	internet-facing
LOAD_BALANCER	balancer-1	balancer-1-000580826076.lb.c-09.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	2016-12-09T06:16:04.197Z	internet-facing
#
#
{code}

as per the "2016-12-09T06:16:08.890Z" timestamp above.

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.4.0-0.25812.163.20170303gitb711a30.el7}}

*Steps*

# Deploy Eucalyptus VPC, multi-cluster cloud - [hspencer-529-maint-4.4|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/529/]
# Create non-eucalyptus account (example {{engineering}}) via {{euare-accountcreate}}
# Using linked {{cfn-elb-vpc-template.json}}, create stacks in a couple of the AZs:
{code}
[root@a-34-l ~]# euform-validate-template --template-file cfn-elb-vpc-template.json --region eng-admin@
DESCRIPTION	CloudFormation template to create an ELB in Eucalyptus VPC
PARAMETER	AZNumber	false		Numeric Representation of Availability Zone
[root@a-34-l ~]# for x in {1..20}; do euform-create-stack ELBStack${x} --template-file cfn-elb-vpc-template.json -p AZNumber=1 --region eng-admin@; sleep 1; done

# List ELBs, and search for ELBs with a timestamp ending with {{0Z}}:
